message.subject: Enron's 201 Strategy
message.content:
M1.1. Rick and Steve -
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. Attached is Enron's government affairs strategy with respect to the potential
threat of "201" restrictions on steel imports.
[Inform: Enron's government affairs strategy attached]
M1.3. This was developed with the
input of the DC office and outside counsel.
[Inform: document was developed with input of DC office and outside counsel]
M1.4. We will be meeting with Eric
Thode later this week to discuss the public relations piece.
[Inform: Lisa et al. will meet with Eric later in the week to discuss PR piece]
M1.5. Let me know if you have any questions, or if you would like background
information on section 201.
[Inform: Rick and Steve should ask Lisa questions, or ask for background info on section 201 if they need it]

message.subject: Enron's 201 Strategy
message.content:
M2.1. I sent the draft strategy in yesterday's email to you.
[Inform: draft strategy sent yesterday]
M2.2. Here is the final
version that we shared with Jeff.
[Inform: currently attached strategy is final version]
M2.3. I apologize for any confusion that this
caused.
[Inform: apology for any confusion caused]
